Uses of Class
org.writeforward.logger.ConfigurationBuilder

  • Packages that use ConfigurationBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.writeforward.logger  

    • Uses of ConfigurationBuilder in org.writeforward.logger

      Methods in org.writeforward.logger that return ConfigurationBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConfigurationBuilder Configurator.build()
      Starts a new Configuration Builder.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.isSlow(java.lang.Boolean slow)
      Sets isSlow.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.numberOfStackFrames(int frames)
      How many stack frames do you want to output during each log event? Your could output all of them all the time, but that gets old fast.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withActiveLevel(Level l)
      Enables/Activates a level for outputting.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withInactiveLevel(Level l)
      Deactivate a level from the output.
      ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.withOutput(Output o)
      Add an output object to the configuration.
